name: Cat RPG (Alpha)
description:
Cat RPG is an open world role playing game where you play as a cat.

Choose between a variety of felines on this epic catventure. You'll explore around a town, forests, buildings, and more all while battling the foes of felines everywhere.

Over 20 enemies including but not limited to birds, snakes, dogs, and other cats.

Build relationships with people around town and go on quests. There's a lot to discover so get started now!

(Currently in Alpha and not final product)

This game is currently back in production! For updates check my twitter.

Please leave feedback at catterpg@gmail.com
